body: Python is not building the bz2 module because it is trying to link to the bzip2 package's .a file which was not compiled -fpic. The bzip2 package does build a shared library, but only appears to generate versioned .so files/links, i.e., libbz2.so.1.0 and libbz2.so.1.0.6 and not the generic libbz2.so.
title: Python and bzip2
